column5: A road legal version would be cool too.  http://www.tetra-pod.net/
Pretty neat rig.  For certain back lakes - great idea!
Pretty neat idea, a buddy of mine has a Fold-a-boat or something to that effect but it is not as transportable as this thing
That is pretty slick , can you imagine the water you could fish with that setup Anyone know a cost of one of these units ?
I saw an on-line price of $3000.00 but they are at the Sportsman Show so I'll check to see if that is correct

http://predatorplastics.com/page10.html  is this the same company?   when I first saw these last year I was immediately ready to buy, and they actually had stock at a local dealer and checked them out, pretty cool, seems sturdy and highly useful...but the local price was 3,599...it's just way too expensive
You can buy an ATV trailer and a good quality older 12 footer for less than what that costs.
I can just imagine, the holding open clip lets go, giver gas and the dm thing folds shut with you inside...
Wow , that's a bit pricey don't you think , as Joeytier said you can buy a quad trailer and used 12 ft aluminum for $1500

Wow , that's a bit pricey don't you think , as Joeytier said you can buy a quad trailer and used 12 ft aluminum for $1500  exactly what we ended up doing   the folding aspect is nice, but 3k for a piece of plastic is insane...if it was priced around 1K it would likely be a better seller

It,s pretty much what I was given by one of my uncles many years ago. it looked like a suit case. Strapped it to the top of my ole chevet. LOL  It was a trunk that was 4'x4'x4'. It was held together with a 4' hinge. I fished and duck hunted out of it.
